body_html:
I created a preliminary PR in my fork TeamCheesy#49, so you can see the code. It is a feature branch on top of the new conference table in #761

  • Question 1: I created a Conferences::Importer.
    After I finished it I wondered: shouldn't I instantiate the Importer?
  • Question 2: I want to add a csv file for the specs. I searched for inspiration in the Webz and in the Teams app, but I can't figure it out yet. Tips?
body_text:
I created a preliminary PR in my fork TeamCheesy#49, so you can see the code. It is a feature branch on top of the new conference table in #761

 Question 1: I created a Conferences::Importer.
After I finished it I wondered: shouldn't I instantiate the Importer?
 Question 2:  I want to add a csv file for the specs. I searched for inspiration in the Webz and in the Teams app, but I can't figure it out yet. Tips?
body:
I created a preliminary PR in my fork https://github.com/TeamCheesy/rgsoc-teams/pull/49, so you can see the code. It is a feature branch on top of the new conference table in #761 
- [ ] Question 1: I created a `Conferences::Importer`. 
After I finished it I wondered: shouldn't I instantiate the Importer?
- [ ] Question 2:  I want to add a csv file for the specs. I searched for inspiration in the Webz and in the Teams app, but I can't figure it out yet. Tips?
